original_text: You have taken hold of me. Because of my troubles, people think that I am guilty. Because my body is so thin, people think that I have done bad things. You have taken hold of me.
korean_text: 주께서 나를 시들게 하셨으니 이는 나를 향하여 증거를 삼으심이라 나의 파리한 모습이 일어나서 대면하여 내 앞에서 증언하리이다

sentences.original_text: You have taken hold of me.
people think that I am guilty.
Because my body is so thin,
people think that I have done bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 내가 나쁜 일을 했다고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: You have taken hold of me.
